name: Vip Executive Saldanha Hotel

reviews.text: A very very basic hotel that was old, smelly and staff were VERY rude..
reviews.title: VIP - very disappointing!
Very good bargain for the price
reviews.text: Our room was a good size but very dark, old furnishings and in need of a good airing and major spring clean. Hard to complain for the price however we did find other places in Portugal and Lisbon that were similar prices and much newer and cleaner. was in a good location handy to shops and metro but would not stay here again - ever!

reviews.title: good value!
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel from Dec 26 2004 to Jan 01 2005. We've greatly appreciated this hotel since it is conveniently located 5 minutes walking distance from a subway station and main bus routes that get you downtown and since it is located in a quiet environment with plenty of restaurants nearby. The room was clean, comfortable and a very good value given the price and location. Now, 2 negative remarks about this hotel: 1) The staff is not very friendly, will remain distant and unattentive but we believe this is a minor inconvenience and 2) the breakfast, at an additional cost of 4 Euros per person, is minimal and not worth the price (solution to this problem: on a nearby street, 3 minutes walk from this hotel, there's an Ibis Hotel which charges 5 Euros per person and which has a superb buffet breakfast). All this to say, we would go back to this hotel without a doubt.

description: The Saldanha VIP Executive Hotel with 54 rooms, has suffered more than a renovation, the hotel was completely rebuilt, and has now opened has a brand new 4 star Hotel. All rooms are decorated in a comfortable, functional and equipped with modern technology, ideal for business or leisure.
